content: Tool case SC 4MR-22 ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool storage and transport systems > Tool cases- ### FEATURES:Features Helps protect your saw while being stored and transported around your jobsites Robust inlay helps protect and simplify the placement of your tool and accessories in the Hilti tool case Double-carry handle for easy and keyless transportation of two Hilti tool cases in one hand.
